title: Why Maokai doesn't gain MR as he levels up ?
body: I checked Maokai's base stats on lolwiki and found out that he doesn't gain more Magic resist when he levels up and his MR stays at 30. This doesn't make any sense at all because all champions that are labelled as a tank and is melee all have at least about 53MR at lvl18. Can someone from riot please tell me what is happening here ?

replies.body:
Because Maokai is Anti Spell Casting already.

He gains health from your spells cast, why should he get MR per level on top of this, not to mention his ult.

And the other melee non-gainers of MR have reasons as well.

The are only two other melee champions that doesn't gain MR from leveling which is Kassadin and Yasuo. If Maokai gains health from enemies spell cast means he shouldn't gain MR from leveling then why Galio have a MR growth stat ?

oh never noticed. i thought after a certain patch all melees have MR growth. i think if they nerf him in other ways maybe they could give it to him and he could be....well not better but more in line with all the other melees, so says my OCD
